9dfda84821cb393382dc45f52ee96d03c82cca91.commit.message:
Replace javafx.util.Pair with java.util.AbstractMap.SimpleEntry

javafx is not present in OpenJDK and it could be replaced with AbstractMap.SimpleEntry
9dfda84821cb393382dc45f52ee96d03c82cca91.commit.author.name: John Mora

b91e2500df38dccfa84d9d32c5474040634d8ea2.commit.message:
Map Reduce Tests

This commit enables mapreduce tests for the Kudu Datastore. 
It forwards some some configurations from the gora.properties 
file to the Job configurations in order to ensure that 
the datastore instances start up successfully.
b91e2500df38dccfa84d9d32c5474040634d8ea2.commit.author.name: John Mora

Enable remaining tests.
